home.introtext: We are a co-development studio of passionate programmers and game developers dedicated to helping you create immersive and engaging experiences for players around the world.
home.feature1.title: Gameplay
home.feature1.text: We'll work with you to prototype, implement and test gameplay mechanics and features. Together we can create engaging and dynamic gameplay that will captivate players of all kinds.
home.feature2.title: Engine & Graphics
home.feature2.text: Whether you need help in maintaining your in-house engine, or if you want to modify an existing engine. Our team has the expertise you can rely on. Need a custom render pipeline? Say no more.
home.feature3.title: Netcode & Backend
home.feature3.text: Looking to bring a multiplayer mode to your game? We can do the legwork for you. We also architect backend solutions for games that require more advanced lobby systems, and even MMO's.
home.feature4.title: Porting
home.feature4.text: Looking to hire someone to port your game to a new platform? We can handle both the technical side and rework the control scheme.
home.article1.text.p1: Designing and developing digital experiences is our specialty, but our story doesn't end there.
home.article1.text.p2: We deliver a customized corporate identity including logos, fonts, business cards and more. The total package is just as important to us as the details.
home.companyvalue1.title: Customer focus
home.companyvalue1.text: As a customer you will be involved as closely as possible in the implementation of your project. This way you can always make adjustments where necessary and an excellent result is assured.
home.companyvalue2.title: Flexibility
home.companyvalue2.text: Our small and permanent team ensures efficient communication. This way we can always respond to your needs.
home.companyvalue3.title: Expertise
home.companyvalue3.text: Our talented team of developers does not shy away from a challenge. Do you have a complex problem? Our expertise will help you on your way.
home.companyvalue4.title: Support
home.companyvalue4.text: After the completion of your project, we remain available for further support. We also offer tools with which you can adjust the content of your website yourself.
portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.placeholder: We are still setting up, content on this page is coming soon!
about.title: About
about.intro:
We at Spellware Studios provide quality programming and development services for the video game industry. Our team of experienced and talented programmers has a proven track record of success, having worked on critically acclaimed titles such as Baldur's Gate 3 and Wasteland 3. We specialize in crafting high-quality, engaging and immersive games and simulations that are tailored to delight players across multiple platforms including PC, mobile, VR and more.

We are proficient in using popular game engines like Unreal Engine and Unity, as well as custom-built engines. Our ultimate goal is to empower game developers and simulation creators with the tools and expertise they need to bring their ideas to life and create experiences that will stand the test of time and be accessible to everyone.

service.title: Our services
services.feature1.title: Gameplay Programming
services.feature1.text:
We specialize in gameplay programming and work together with our clients to implement, and test gameplay mechanics and features.

We can create engaging and dynamic gameplay mechanics that will captivate players. From character movement to quests and inventory systems, we can help you design and develop the foundation of your game or simulation.
services.feature2.title: Graphics Programming
services.feature2.text:
We offer graphics programming services for the video game industry.

Our team of expert programmers are well-versed in the use of shaders, lighting, and materials to create advanced visual effects and ensure optimal performance on various platforms.
services.feature3.title: Networking and Backend
services.feature3.text:
We design and implement the server infrastructure necessary for multiplayer games and other online features.

We use a variety of programming languages and tools to create stable, scalable, and secure backend systems. Our goal is to help game developers create seamless online experiences for their players.
services.feature4.title: Engine Programming
services.feature4.text:
Our company has experience designing, implementing, and maintaining the underlying game engine that powers a game.

This can include creating custom game engines from scratch, or modifying and extending existing engines to create the technical foundation for game developers to bring their ideas to life.
services.feature5.title: Bugfixing and Optimization
services.feature5.text:
Our team will identify and fix bottlenecks, bugs and glitches that can impact player experience.

From memory management to code refactoring, we will make sure your game runs smoothly and efficiently, providing the players with a polished and enjoyable experience on any platform.
services.feature6.title: Porting
services.feature6.text:
We assist game and simulation developers in expanding the reach of their projects to new platforms.

We have the expertise to take a game designed for one platform and make it compatible with another, while maintaining the quality and features of the original product. We have experience in porting games and simulations to various platforms, including PC, consoles, mobile, and VR.
cookies.div.text: This website uses cookies to enhance the user experience.
